title: The Nuclear Option Special
itunes:title: The Nuclear Option Special
description:
The safety of Ukraine's nuclear power plants has been a concern since Russia's invasion. How far should we worry? And what are the risks of war really escalating to involve nuclear weapons? We get the view of Robert Kelley, a nuclear veteran who led the U.S.'s foremost organization on nuclear emergency response, plus the latest from Bloomberg's Jonathan Tirone. Paul Dorfman from the University of Sussex also joins Bloomberg Westminster's Yuan Potts and Caroline Hepker with his view on the future of nuclear power.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
